headline: Verizon plans to walk back controversial policy after backlash
summary: Verizon is shifting gears after a recent policy change sparked backlash from consumers. Last week, Verizon quietly updated its website to reveal that it has tweaked its device unlock policy for postpaid phone customers. The policy currently states that postpaid phones purchased from Verizon ...
